INNER JOIN m_mold_detail d ON h.moldid = d.moldid AND h.moldno = d.moldno INNER JOIN m_mold m ON d.moldid = m.moldid INNER JOIN m_mold_part p ON d.moldid = p.moldid INNER JOIN v_cust_fg_part v ON p.partid = v.partid WHERE 1=1
v.customerid = #customerId#
d.moldid = #moldId#
d.moldno = #moldNo#
AND h.reportdate >= #startDateHist# AND h.reportdate <= #endDateHist#
p.partid = #partId#

INNER JOIN m_mold_detail d ON h.moldid = d.moldid AND h.moldno = d.moldno INNER JOIN m_mold m ON d.moldid = m.moldid INNER JOIN t_dcplan dcp on dcp.moldId = m.moldid and dcp.moldNo = d.moldno INNER JOIN v_cust_fg_part v ON dcp.partid = v.partid WHERE 1=1
v.customerid = #customerId#
d.moldid = #moldId#
d.moldno = #moldNo#
AND h.reportdate >= #startDateHist# AND h.reportdate <= #endDateHist#
dcp.partid = #partId#
